metadata.key_specifications: 8-Channel 2.5A LED Dot-Controller with Integrated PWM Shunt FETs, SPI Interface, 4.5V to 65V wide input range, 16-bit >20kHz PWM dimming, programmable PWM slew rate and edge shift, internal charge pump with spread spectrum, LED open/short detection and protection, thermal warning, power save mode
metadata.applications: Stage and photography lighting, Surgical lighting, Machine vision and IP camera LED array, Cold/warm WLED lighting, 3D printing, Industrial transportation

page_summaries.content:
TPS92402 8-Channel 2.5A LED Dot-Controller with Integrated PWM Shunt FETs, SPI Interface and Adaptive Configuration

1 Features
• 4.5V to 65V wide input range
• LED common anode or cathode connection
• 8 integrated PWM shunt FETs
– 2.5A FET max continuous current
– Internal 32MHz oscillator for PWM generator
– Programmable 16-bit, >20kHz PWM dimming
• SPI interface and adaptive configuration
– Up to 5MHz SPI clock for data transfer
– Star and daisy chain connection
– One device for 8-LED or 2x 4-LED strings
– Stacking up to 4 devices for 32-LED string
• Enhanced EMI performance
– Programmable PWM slew rate
– Programmable PWM edge shift
– Internal charge pump with spread spectrum
• Full protection features
– LED open detection and protection
– LED short detection
– Shunt FET open detection
– Programmable LED open voltage
– Thermal warning
• Optional power save mode
– PWM output to control LED drivers
– Low power standby mode
• Package: VQFN-36

2 Applications
• Stage and photography lighting
• Surgical lighting
• Machine vision and IP camera LED array
• Cold/warm WLED lighting
• 3D printing
• Industrial transportation

3 Description
The TPS92402 LED dot-controller device enables 8-channel individual lighting solutions by providing up to 2.5A pixel-level LED dimming control with 4.5V to 65V wide input range.

Product Summary.content: TPS92402 is an 8-Channel 2.5A LED Dot-Controller with Integrated PWM Shunt FETs, SPI Interface and Adaptive Configuration. It features a wide input range of 4.5V to 65V, LED common anode or cathode connection, and 8 integrated PWM shunt FETs with 2.5A FET max continuous current and internal 32MHz oscillator for PWM generator with programmable 16-bit, >20kHz PWM dimming.

The TPS92402 has an SPI interface and adaptive configuration with up to 5MHz SPI clock for data transfer, star and daisy chain connection, and the ability to control either 8-LED or 2x 4-LED strings. It can stack up to 4 devices for a 32-LED string. It offers enhanced EMI performance with programmable PWM slew rate, programmable PWM edge shift, and an internal charge pump with spread spectrum.

The device provides full protection features including LED open detection and protection, LED short detection, shunt FET open detection, programmable LED open voltage, and thermal warning. It also has an optional power save mode with PWM output to control LED drivers and low power standby mode. The TPS92402 comes in a VQFN-36 package.

Key applications of the TPS92402 include stage and photography lighting, surgical lighting, machine vision and IP camera LED array, cold/warm WLED lighting, 3D printing, and industrial transportation.

Mechanical Characteristics.content: NOTES: 1. All linear dimensions are in millimeters. Any dimensions in parenthesis are for reference only. Dimensioning and tolerancing per ASME Y14.5M. 2. This drawing is subject to change without notice. 3. The package thermal pad must be soldered to the printed circuit board for optimal thermal and mechanical performance.

NOTES: 4. This package is designed to be soldered to a thermal pad on the board. For more information, see Texas Instruments literature number SLUA271 (www.ti.com/lit/slua271). 5. Vias are optional depending on application, refer to device data sheet. If any vias are implemented, refer to their locations shown on this view. It is recommended that vias under paste be filled, plugged or tented.
NOTES: 6. Laser cutting apertures with trapezoidal walls and rounded corners may offer better paste release. IPC-7525 may have alternate design recommendations.

Packaging Information.content: PACKAGE OUTLINE and EXAMPLE BOARD LAYOUT provide details on the physical dimensions, footprint, and layout guidelines for the VQFN (Plastic Quad Flatpack-No Lead) package type with a maximum height of 1 mm. This includes information relevant for PCB design and manufacturing.

EXAMPLE STENCIL DESIGN and SOLDER PASTE EXAMPLE provide recommendations for stencil apertures and solder paste coverage specific to the VQFN package, enabling optimal solder joint formation during assembly.

The PACKAGE OPTION ADDENDUM table lists the orderable part numbers, package types, quantities, lead finishes, MSL ratings, operating temperatures, and part markings for the various package options available. This information is crucial for selecting the appropriate part and understanding its specifications.

The TAPE AND REEL INFORMATION section provides dimensions and diagrams detailing the tape and reel packaging for different orderable part numbers of the VQFN package. This data is essential for automated pick-and-place assembly processes and ensuring compatibility with manufacturing equipment.

The NOTES sections provide additional guidelines and considerations related to the package's thermal pad soldering, via implementation, laser cutting apertures, and design recommendations from relevant industry standards like IPC-7525. These notes offer valuable insights for optimizing the assembly process and ensuring reliable performance.
